text:
Need to allows service deployments to have configuration and be easily deployed 
into the myrmidon container. That way we don't have to worry about any 
extensability concerns as users can just drop the services in as they want. 

People who are writing tools on top of Myrmidon will also be able to drop 
extensions in and it will magically work ... or so the theory goes.
creator: donaldp@apache.org
